Package net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.event

Events not specific to another package and classes that manage events live here.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ActionListener
    ActionListener is used to fire events when some action takes place, such as a button is clicked.
    ErrorListener
    The ErrorListener interface is used to notify objects that an error condition occurred.
    EventQueueElement
    An element in a EventQueue.
    NotificationListener
    Listener interface for NotificationEvent events.
    PassiveListener
    A marker interface for event listeners indicating that the listener is passive, i.e.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionEvent
    ActionEvent used for ActionListener events.
    AllListener
    A listener that can respond to any MIWT event.
    ApplicationEvent
    This event is fired when application level events occurred, such as an application being started or stopped.
    ErrorEvent
    The ErrorEvent object describes an error event.
    Event
    Base class for events.
    EventListenerList
    The EventListenerList helps maintain event listeners.
    EventQueue
    Processes MIWT events.
    ListenerEventQueueElement<T extends EventListener,Z extends Event>
    Event queue element intended for use by the EventListenerList class.
    NotificationEvent
    A NotificationEvent is used a base class for system-level events such as an application has started, stopped, a feature is available etc.
    RecordingEventQueueElement
    An EventQueueElement implementation that holds properties for recording input events.
    ReflectionEventQueueElement
    An event queue element using reflection.
    RunnableEventQueueElement
    EventQueueElement implementation that executes a Runnable when the element is fired.
    ValidationEventQueueElement
    Event queue element that performs component validation.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ApplicationEventType
    Enumeration to describe ApplicationEvent types.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    EventQueueException
    Exception class thrown while processing events.

Package net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.event Description

Events not specific to another package and classes that manage events live here. The EventListenerList class provides event listener management and event firing. Please refer to the listener and event class documentation for further documentation.
